\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* saith \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w scripture|strong="G1124"\w*? \w Abraham|strong="G0011"\w* \w believed|strong="G4100"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* reputed \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* unto \w justice|strong="G1343"\w*.

\w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w blessedness|strong="G3108"\w* \w then|strong="G2532"\w*, doth \w it|strong="G3778"\w* remain \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w circumcision|strong="G4061"\w* \w only|strong="G2532"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w uncircumcision|strong="G0203"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*? \w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w we|strong="G3778"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w* \w that|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w Abraham|strong="G0011"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* reputed \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w justice|strong="G1343"\w*.

\w How|strong="G4459"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w it|strong="G1510"\w* reputed? \w When|strong="G1722"\w* \w he|strong="G1510"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w circumcision|strong="G4061"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w uncircumcision|strong="G0203"\w*? \w Not|strong="G3756"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w circumcision|strong="G4061"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w uncircumcision|strong="G0203"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w might|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w father|strong="G3962"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w circumcision|strong="G4061"\w*; \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w them|strong="G1722"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w*, \w that|strong="G1722"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w circumcision|strong="G4061"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w them|strong="G1722"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G1722"\w* \w follow|strong="G4748"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w steps|strong="G2487"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* faithful, \w that|strong="G1722"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w uncircumcision|strong="G0203"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w our|strong="G2532"\w* \w father|strong="G3962"\w* \w Abraham|strong="G0011"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w promise|strong="G1860"\w* \w to|strong="G2228"\w* \w Abraham|strong="G0011"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w to|strong="G2228"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w seed|strong="G4690"\w*, \w that|strong="G0846"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* should \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w heir|strong="G2818"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w world|strong="G2889"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w justice|strong="G1343"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w heirs|strong="G2818"\w*, \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w made|strong="G2758"\w* \w void|strong="G2758"\w*, \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w promise|strong="G1860"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w made|strong="G2758"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w no|strong="G1487"\w* effect.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w* worketh \w wrath|strong="G3709"\w*. \w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w where|strong="G3757"\w* \w there|strong="G1510"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w neither|strong="G3756"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w there|strong="G1510"\w* \w transgression|strong="G3847"\w*.

(\w As|strong="G5613"\w* \w it|strong="G5087"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w written|strong="G1125"\w*: \w I|strong="G3739"\w* \w have|strong="G1510"\w* \w made|strong="G5087"\w* thee \w a|strong="G5613"\w* \w father|strong="G3962"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w nations|strong="G1484"\w*,) \w before|strong="G2713"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w believed|strong="G4100"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* quickeneth \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* calleth \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w things|strong="G4183"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w*.

\w Who|strong="G3739"\w* \w against|strong="G2596"\w* \w hope|strong="G1680"\w* \w believed|strong="G4100"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w hope|strong="G1680"\w*; \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w might|strong="G1484"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w made|strong="G1096"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w father|strong="G3962"\w* \w of|strong="G1909"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w nations|strong="G1484"\w*, \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w So|strong="G3779"\w* shall thy \w seed|strong="G4690"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w weak|strong="G0770"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*; \w neither|strong="G2532"\w* did \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w consider|strong="G2657"\w* \w his|strong="G1438"\w* \w own|strong="G1438"\w* \w body|strong="G4983"\w* \w now|strong="G2532"\w* \w dead|strong="G3499"\w*, whereas \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* almost \w an|strong="G2532"\w* \w hundred|strong="G1541"\w* \w years|strong="G1541"\w* \w old|strong="G1541"\w*, \w nor|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w dead|strong="G3499"\w* \w womb|strong="G3388"\w* \w of|strong="G4983"\w* Sara.

\w In|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w promise|strong="G1860"\w* \w also|strong="G1161"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w he|strong="G1161"\w* staggered \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w by|strong="G1519"\w* distrust; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w strengthened|strong="G1743"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w giving|strong="G1325"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*:

Most \w fully|strong="G4135"\w* knowing, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* whatsoever \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w has|strong="G3739"\w* \w promised|strong="G1861"\w*, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w able|strong="G1415"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w perform|strong="G4160"\w*.
\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w therefore|strong="G1352"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w was|strong="G0846"\w* reputed \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* unto \w justice|strong="G1343"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w is|strong="G0846"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w written|strong="G1125"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w* \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w was|strong="G0846"\w* reputed \w to|strong="G0846"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* unto justice,

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* \w us|strong="G1537"\w*, \w to|strong="G1909"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w it|strong="G1223"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* reputed, \w if|strong="G2532"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w him|strong="G3739"\w*, \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w raised|strong="G1453"\w* \w up|strong="G1453"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G2962"\w*, \w our|strong="G2424"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*,
